plot: A biopic of Brazilian singer Tim Maia, from his childhood in Rio De Janeiro until his death at age 55, including the passage by the United States, where the singer discovers new musical styles and is arrested for theft and possession drug.
title: Tim Maia
plot_es: A biopic of Brazilian singer Tim Maia, from his childhood in Rio De Janeiro until his death at age 55, including the passage by the United States, where the singer discovers new musical styles and is arrested for theft and possession drug.
plot_en: A biopic of Brazilian singer Tim Maia, from his childhood in Rio De Janeiro until his death at age 55, including the passage by the United States, where the singer discovers new musical styles and is arrested for theft and possession drug.
